content.text: The application is a web-based SaaS (software as a service) application that runs in a web browser.

Our products require a broadband internet connection and an operating system capable of running the latest version of common web browsers (see list below). Ensure that your operating system meets or exceeds the browser’s minimum or recommended requirements. The application is supported on browsers running Windows or macOS.

You must be running the most recent version of your selected browser – most browsers are kept up-to-date automatically. While older browser versions will most likely work we develop and test using the latest browser versions thus older versions are not supported.
The main application is not supported in mobile browsers, instead you will need to use one of our mobile apps.
